title: New Suitcase Type Foundry from the Czech Republic
content:
There is a new type foundry in the Czech Republic: Suitcase Type Foundry ( [http://www.suitcasetype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121412/http:/www.suitcasetype.com/)). You can see samples online or you can download PDF. All families contain extensive set of characters covering majority of European languages using Latin script. Small caps, ligatures and other features included.   
   
The interview with type Designer Tomas Brousil is in the february issue of TYPO magazine [http://www.magtypo.cz](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121412/http:/www.magtypo.cz/) (maybe not yet anounced on this website).
author: filip blazek : Sun, 2004-02-29 15:33
